video.title: Witches of East End
video.synopsis: Besides being an artist and the mother of two daughters, Joanna Beauchamp harbors an identity she hides from the world: that of a centuries-old witch.

episodes.synopsis: When her estranged sister shows up with a warning, free-spirited artist Joanna must reveal to her daughters that they are immortal witches.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ingrid uses family heirlooms to resurrect her Aunt Wendy, with unforeseen consequences. Joanna is arrested for murder.
episodes.title: Marilyn Fenwick, R.I.P.

episodes.synopsis: Joanna tries to figure out which of her former enemies might be responsible for framing her. Wendy teaches Ingrid and Freya how to use their powers.
episodes.title: Today I Am a Witch

episodes.synopsis: Afraid for Adam's safety, Ingrid reevaluates her relationship with him. Penelope recruits Freya to help her mend the rift between Dash and Killian.
episodes.title: A Few Good Talismen

episodes.synopsis: Ingrid finds a unique way to mourn for Adam. Joanna and Harrison take their friendship to the next level. Freya meets Dash's ex-fiancée, Elyse.
episodes.title: Electric Avenue

episodes.synopsis: Freya makes a startling discovery at Fair Haven. Ingrid has flashbacks to one of her past lives.
episodes.title: Potentia Noctis

episodes.synopsis: The shifter summons a familiar face. Ingrid discovers something startling from her past. Wendy turns over a new leaf.
episodes.title: Unburied

episodes.synopsis: Wendy and Joanna come to blows over a long-held secret. The shifter threatens Freya. Ingrid suspects Mike's ulterior motives.
episodes.title: Snake Eyes

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious professor with old connections to the Beauchamps tries to help Freya regain her powers. Killian makes a decision about his future.
episodes.title: A Parching Imbued

episodes.synopsis: Freya's wedding day arrives, Joanna and Wendy discover the identity of the shifter and Ingrid learns some unnerving details about Mike.
episodes.title: Oh, What a World!

episodes.synopsis: The Beauchamps try to recall events after the portal opened; Freya has visions of Killian in danger; an ailing Joanna is surprised by a visitor.
episodes.title: A Moveable Beast

episodes.synopsis: Joanna delights in Frederick's return, but Wendy doesn't trust him; Killian finds much in common with Eva; Dash must deal with his blackmailer.
episodes.title: The Son Also Rises

episodes.synopsis: Freya hunts for Killian; Dash uncovers his blackmailer's identity; Wendy and Joanna hope to discover Frederick's true motives by following him.
episodes.title: The Old Man and the Key

episodes.synopsis: Wendy and Tommy's meetings are a disaster; Frederick's Asgard friends make an unwelcome visit; Dash and Killian's inheritance proves most interesting.
episodes.title: The Brothers Grimoire

episodes.synopsis: Freya relives a past life with Killian; Dash's spell on his patient has dire consequences; Joanna asks Alex to help stop a deadly dark being.
episodes.title: Boogie Knights

episodes.synopsis: Ingrid is now the Mandragora's mate and will die if it is killed, so Freya asks Dash to help save her; Wendy has her doubts about Freddie's loyalty.
episodes.title: When a Mandragora Loves a Woman

episodes.synopsis: An old friend of the Beauchamps visits Joanna and Freddie; Wendy encounters someone from her past at an art gala; Killian doubts his feelings for Eva.
episodes.title: Art of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Freya and Frederick celebrate a milestone birthday, Tarkoff puts pressure on Frederick; Wendy surprises Tommy; Joanna faces one of her worst fears.
episodes.title: Sex, Lies, and Birthday Cake

episodes.synopsis: Tarkoff seeks revenge against Frederick; Freya confronts Killian; Ingrid gives Dash an ultimatum; Joanna takes action to protect her family.
episodes.title: Smells Like King Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Devastated by Tarkoff's actions, Joanna attempts drastic measures; Dash's secrets are revealed; Wendy and Joanna reconnect with their father.
episodes.title: The Fall of the House of Beauchamp

episodes.synopsis: Joanna, Freya and Wendy revisit one of their past lives; Dash has an intriguing one night stand; Ingrid tries to bond with her grandfather.
episodes.title: Poe Way Out

episodes.synopsis: While in a past life, Joanna is tracked down by a dangerous admirer; after hearing about Freya, Killian makes a rash decision; King propositions Dash.
episodes.title: Box to the Future

episodes.synopsis: Joanna tries to escape from Tarkoff; Ingrid learns shocking news about herself; Dash's dark past closes in on him; Killian tries to stay alive.
episodes.title: For Whom the Spell Tolls
